attributes.action: ban, with immediate effect, the payment of bonuses to staff of banks who have received a government bail-out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The idea that tax payers' money, given to bail-out the banks and therefore stabilise the economy, should be used to pay staff bonuses is immoral and wholly disheartening.
Whilst many companies not eligible for government bail-outs face bankruptcy, banks have the arrogance to spend the tax payers' money on staff bonuses. Moreover, it is entirely unclear what the banks' staff have done to merit these bonuses.
